sentences.sentence: People in civvy street have an easy life.
sentences.translation: 老百姓过着安乐的生活。

sentences.sentence: They are still waiting for the national carrier, BSNL, to build them an alternative network before they hand over the airwaves to the BlackBerry-bashers on civvy street.
sentences.translation: 他们仍然在等待国家运营商，BSNL，在他们把电波交给civvy街的BlackBerry - bashers以前给他们建一个另外的网络。
